message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $10,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is unfortunately below my minimum. I'm willing to go down to $11,000, considering the value you place on the product. This is a fair price that benefits us both.
